title: The Everything Kosher Slow Cooker Cookbook: Includes Chicken Soup with Lukshen Noodles, Apple-Mustard Beef Brisket, Sweet and Spicy Pulled Chicken, ... Pudding with Caramel Sauce and hundreds more!
features: Many traditional kosher meals benefit from long, slow cooking. But who has time to spend hours in the kitchen? With
The Everything Kosher Slow Cooker Cookbook

, all you'll need is a few minutes of preparation, and the slow cooker does the rest! This all-inclusive cookbook contains 300 recipes perfect for today's busy family—utilizing wholesome ingredients that adhere to the highest kosher standards, including:

With a collection of recipes for every meal and celebration, this book is packed with dishes that blend satisfying, mouthwatering flavors, and labor-saving convenience. Don't spend any more time worrying about what's for dinner or when you'll have time to make it—with this sensational book, you can create extraordinary kosher dishes without the fuss!
description: "The format is easy to follow. Some of the recipes include helpful hints and extra information.... Most of the recipes are easy to prepare and delicious. This book is recommended for all libraries that collect cookbooks." - Association of Jewish Libraries Reviews

is a recipe developer and food blogger. Her blog "Oh! You Cook!" (http://ohyoucook.blogspot.com) specializes in great-tasting recipes that just happen to be kosher. She is a member of several blogger groups, including The Secret Recipe Club, The Crazy Cooking Challenge, and The Improv Challenge, and she has been featured as a Food52 Editor's Pick. She lives in Morganville, NJ.
